goal.ch: 藉由學習基本植物生理學的實驗技術，如蒸散作用與光合作用速率的測定、植物賀爾蒙影響植物生長的測定方式和植物中各種酵素活性的分析方法，均可幫助同學建立最基本的認知，有助於未來的研究工作。
goal.en: “By learning basic plant physiology experimental techniques , such as measuring the rate of transpiration and photosynthesis , plants the way hormones affect the determination of plant growth and plant enzyme activity in a variety of analytical methods , may help students to create basic awareness to help future research.“

outline.ch:
“1~2 Plant Cells
3~4 Plant Hormones
5~6 Signaling and function of plant hormones
7~8 Seed germination
9~10 Seedling Development
11~12 Growth and differentiation of the shoot
13~14 Leaf growth and differentiation
15~16 Root growth and development
17~18 Vernalization“
outline.en:
“1~2 Plant Cells

5~6 Signaling and function of plant hormones

17~18 Vernalization“
